answers.answer: Had a scan last friday was 34weeks and  baby was messuring 5.5. Tummy was a little bit big but that was no big deal coz of the GD but aside from that he seems to be perfect.

question: I was diagnosed with GD and at 32 weeks the baby was measuring 5p just wondering what other mums bubs were measuring at 32 weeks :)
title: gestational diabetes
